Name: Show file extensions
description: Show file extensions in Windows displays the suffix at the end of file names (like .txt, .jpg, .exe) etc

Name: Show Super Hidden
description: Show Super Hidden displays files and folders

Name: Dark Mode
description: Dark Mode is a setting that changes the screen to darker colors, reducing eye strain and saving battery life on OLED screens

Name: NumLook
description: Toggle the Num Lock key state when your computer starts

Name: Sticky Keys
description: Sticky keys is an accessibility feature of some graphical user interfaces which assists users who have physical disabilities

Name: Mouse Acceleration
description: Cursor movement is affected by the speed of your physical mouse movements

Name: End Task On Taskbar Windows 11
description: End task when right clicking a program in the taskbar

Name: Clear Page File At Shutdown
description: Removes sensitive data stored in virtual memory when the system shuts down

Name: Auto End Tasks
description: Automatically end tasks that are not responding

Name: Launch To This PC
description: File Explorer open directly to This PC

Name: Always show icons never Thumbnail
description: Show icons in the file explorer instead of thumbnails
